author: 3xmd1559sporebraytondingo
content:
<@!624875260373762069> and I have been thinking about this recently. The hardware social contract is likely outside the remit of this discord, but I feel we've been a little heavy on the disk burden. How feasible is it to allow transient storage that lives in RAM: would this slow down execution quite a bit (e.g. very slow compared to cache). 

https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153
